评论概述: Great shirt at a good price
评论详情: I like the weight of the shirt - light enough for slightly warm days, but heavy enough for adequate warmth on cooler days.  I needed XL to fit in the shoulders, I am only 6' tall so it is a little longer than I prefer, but not too long.  Very comfortable and appears to be well made.

This blue is a great color and it is a good thickness; not that thin stuff like most.  The sizing, however, runs to the small side.  I am an XL and this is almost a little too tight.  If sizing were 46-48 it is closer to the 46 (and I don't mean a 47).  I'm not sure that ordering a size larger than needed would fit okay or not.
Love it fits great
I liked it because the shirt look nice

I love the look and feel of this pullover. The quality is really good and feels great to wear. The fabric very nice and a only slightly a little course on the skin if worn without a long sleeve shirt. The dark blue one works well with almost anything underneath. With warmer weather having extended this year, I am excited to be able to wear it now with the weather change and find myself wanting to wear this more often. Comfortable and can also be worn for more formal occasions or casual. At 5'8 160 lbs the small fits, but I could have gone with a medium as well.
The perfect red color (not orangey). The perfect weight for wearing alone or for layering. The perfect fit. So perfect in so many ways, I just ordered another one in a different color.
Buen producto, talla, color y terminado. 👍

This is a great budget zip-up for general use when it is a bit cooler. I generally prefer full fleece but gave this a try and it is fine as long as the weather agrees. Looks good, nice color. Fit is normal.
Very nice looking but a too small for an extra large and the sleeves are short. Unfortunately, had to return.

评论概述: A Soft, Unique Take On A Closet Staple!
评论详情: Fall is here and this pullover is right on time! We've seen these before and are pretty much a staple in many closets. However, the Coofandy brand always manages to put a little extra spin on their garments. Like many of their offerings, this pullover is well-made and, once you put your hands on it, you notice an amazing texture, great stitching, and a unique pattern not seen in other clothes. This seems to be a staple in the Coofandy camp, and I love it!  This pullover is warm, yet surprisingly light - you can put a t-shirt on under this and just go or, if you like, put on a nice button down under it and it will be perfect for a brisk fall evening! I ordered the XXL and it fit me quite well - even with my weight gain!  This simple piece is a must have in any closet and can be had at an amazing price!
If anyone from quality control is listening. I have one word ZIPPERS
N/A
very wrinkled and not easy to iron

I had a similar style pullover in white that I wore so often, it's no longer in a condition that is respectable to wear. I actually prefer the thinner weight of this brand as I can now wear it with lighter weight jackets in the spring and fall. Still a great wardrobe staple to layer for winter wear. I washed it without issue and streamed it in the dryer without shrinking, however the deep packaging creases did require additional hand streaming to remove. The medium is my usual size and it's a perfect fit as far as length and chest. Not too baggy or too tight. I need to order a couple more colors!
My husband is very happy with this product.  He likes the fit and feel of this pullover.  It washes well and is soft.

I've never gotten a bad or ill-fitting piece of clothing from COOFANDY. This brand continues to consistently deliver quality products, and that trend continues with this quarter-zip pullover. It's a bit too warm/thick for summer, so I'm saving it for my fall/winter wardrobe, and it's sure to turn heads wherever I wear it, with the soft, quality material and vibrant color.

This is my fourth piece of apparel from this brand, and I continue to be impressed. What first impressed me was the quality of the material. A lot of pieces I've tried from overseas are made with thin, silky material. This brand is so much better. The only qualifier I would add is sizing. I'm 6'3", 180lbs, and usually fall between a large and XL, I've always selected XL from this brand, and each have fir very well.
Great little pullover to layer with your other pieces. Casual but dressy enough that you won't look like a slob. Material is nice and the fit was comparable to a standard US medium.

评论概述: Don't know how to explain the fabric
评论详情: The material is 95% polyester and 5% spandex, it is reasonably soft, but definitely not the most comfortable layer. The long sleeves and casual quarter-zip style make it versatile for various occasions. The stitching is excellent, ensuring durability and adding to the overall quality of the pullover. The inside of the shirt feels quite itchy against the skin, requiring me to wear an undershirt WITH sleeves. It is lightweight but thick and durable, not super stretchy, but it holds its form. It is also lightweight enough to wear during spring and fall, but it also works as a layering piece in winter.
This fits true to size. Fabric is breathable and not heavy. Definitely a good fall buy for the fellas.
This has really nice weight to it and still manages to be lightweight. The material doesn't feel cheap. The stitching is really well done. Just make sure you get the right size haha

The nice tight weave of this long sleeve sweatshirt makes the light fabric very soft and warm.  Works well to break the wind but does not feel like you are wearing a heavy coat.  Nice color and texture.

评论概述: Comfortable quarter-zip, sleeves just a tad short
评论详情: This is a comfortable quarter-zip pullover.  The fabric has a pattern that's subtle yet adds some texture to the look.  The color is nice - this one is gray and it's a darker charcoal color.  Fit is good; I typically wear a large and this fits well, except the sleeve length is just a bit short. Not really noticeable to someone looking at it, but I can feel the difference.  Personal preference only.  It's not overly warm, which is a good thing. It's a nice layer over a polo or t-shirt.

I'm 5'8" 140lbs. I got size S and it fits me just right. The construction is good. The fabric material was a bit too stiff and grainy, so I threw it into the washer and medium dry. It came out better. Still a bit stiff, but it's also the reason why it "looks" good and unwrinkled. I think this is a good addition to my wardrobe.

This quarter zip shirt is lightweight so it's perfect for those cool fall/spring days when you need a little something over your shirt to keep you warm. The quarter zip gives you options on how to wear it. I ordered  an XL as I wanted to ensure it fits well over any shirt and the fit is perfect for me. I have two minor issues that prevents me from giving it 5 stars and they are that it does not have any pockets and it does show some wrinkles. The tag says not to tumble dry, but I put it in the dryer on delicate cycle to help remove the wrinkles and I did not see any adverse effects to the shirt.

This men's quarter zip-up pullover from Coofandy is made with a soft fabric that feels gentle against the skin and has a lightweight “mock” neck line which is a comfortable to wear. The long sleeves and casual quarter-zip style make it versatile for various occasions, from a casual day out to a crisp morning walk. The stitching is excellent, ensuring durability and adding to the overall quality of the pullover. Moreover, the stark white color adds a crisp, clean look that is both classic and contemporary.  I've purchased other Coofandy products and have been underwhelmed. This pullover is a nice upgrade!

My husband likes this pullover. It fits him well, and looks great too! It is well made and we both appreciate the attention to details and construction. It is comfy, and the fabric was unexpected, but not in a bad way. Its lightweight but thick and durable, not super stretchy but it holds its form. No complaints, this is a solid pullover.

It's definitely true to size. It fits well. It's stitched well and the zipper function works well but I'm not a big fan of the fabric. It's just a little stiff and cheap looking. The listing photos definitely make it look nicer than it is. I don't completely hate it though. I'll get some use out of it but I thought from the listing photos it would be a better quality.

I got this as an underlayer for my motorcycle jacket because it covers the neck and is easy to take on and off with the zipper. Personally I like the fabric because it helps to block out the wind and is somewhere between a thick sweatshirt and a thin t-shirt material. It is not bulky and great for my needs. I only weigh 145 lb and the size small fits me perfectly.

Love this brand so I was happy to see they had a 1/4 zip pullover for when it starts to get colder outside. I felt the sleeves were a little bulky for me in the XL size as I am 5'5 215 pounds. Hoping it will shrink down a little bit after the first wash. I think it will be a nice looking, warm, pullover.

评论概述: Good design but could use better material
评论详情: I like the design of the pullover sweatshirt, perfect for mild fall season weather. However, the material is 95% polyester and 5% spandex,  it's reasonably soft, but definitely not the most comfortable layer, if you don't wear another layer inside.

My spouse is not keeping this one. We both have sensory sensitivities - relatively mild in both cases, but we both also see no reason whatsoever to wear things that are even a little uncomfortable because why would anybody do that to themselves?  So this isn't soft. The fabric is thick, and it will be quite warm - warmer than it looks. The construction is good as far as I can see - no red flags to the non-expert eyes, at least. The blue color is beautiful, vibrant but not screaming bright, and in general I and my spouse would both be fans if it were just a little less stiff and a little softer.  The price is pretty low for what you're getting, though, especially again in terms of the potential warmth factor, so if you don't have sensory issues (or plan to wear it with long sleeves - the neck didn't bother him), this might not be a bad risk, especially if returns are easy in your area.

评论概述: Different from what I've come to expect from COOFANDY
评论详情: I really love this brand and have a lot of clothes from COOFANDY, but this pullover isn't for me.  The material seems thick and stiff.  The sizing is a little small on me and all other tops from this brand in the same size fit me fine.  The pullover is made of okay material and the construction is good, so I debated between 3 and 4 stars and opted for the latter because I think that this is a good brand and that some might like this pullover, it's just not good for me.
I like the shape of this pullover. It fits well and feels good and feels like a quality piece of clothing

I recently added the COOFANDY Men's Quarter Zip Up Pullover to my wardrobe, and it's been a fantastic addition. As someone who appreciates comfort and style, this lightweight mock neck sweatshirt has quickly become a go-to piece for me.  The first thing that stood out was the fabric. It's soft, skin-friendly, and breathable, providing a comfortable wearing experience throughout all seasons. I’ve worn it in cooler weather and layered it under a jacket when it got really cold. It resists shrinkage and wrinkles, which is a big plus for me because I’m not a fan of ironing.  The design is another aspect I love. The quarter zip adds a touch of versatility and makes it easy to adjust based on the weather or my activity level. The polo collar and ribbed cuffs give it a refined look, while the solid color design keeps it classic and timeless. I chose a versatile color that pairs well with almost everything in my closet.  Matching this pullover with different outfits has been a breeze. I’ve worn it with jeans for a casual look and paired it with slacks for a more polished appearance at work. It also looks great with shorts and linen pants, making it a versatile piece for various occasions. Whether I’m heading to a casual dinner or a business meeting, it fits the bill perfectly.  One of the standout features is its suitability for various occasions. I’ve worn it for daily activities, work, and even on a couple of weekend trips. It's lightweight enough to wear during spring and fall, but it also works as a layering piece in winter. The mock neck adds a bit of extra warmth without being too stifling.  Maintenance has been straightforward. I've machine washed it several times, and it has maintained its shape and color beautifully. I appreciate that it’s easy to care for—no special treatment needed.  Overall, the COOFANDY Men's Quarter Zip Up Pullover is a great blend of comfort, style, and functionality. It’s a versatile addition to any wardrobe, and I’m extremely happy with my purchase. If you’re looking for a casual yet stylish pullover that can be dressed up or down, I highly recommend giving this one a try.

评论概述: Itchy non-breathable material and prone to wrinkles. Not a comfortable shirt overall.
评论详情: The COOFANDY quarter zip-up pullover is crafted from a blend of 95% polyester and 5% spandex. While the shirt is machine washable, be sure to avoid tumble drying as indicated in the care instructions. Any way you launder it, it is prone to wrinkles--perhaps not as much as some shirts but still enough to be noticeable.  The fabric is neither particularly soft nor stiff, but the collar manages to be uncomfortably rigid. I found the shirt lacking in breathability. The inside of the shirt feels quite itchy against the skin, requiring me to wear an undershirt WITH sleeves. Tolerable for casual daily wear on laundry days, its overall appearance does not inspire me to wear it to work.

This men’s long sleeve pullover features soft, breathable fabric that resists shrinkage and wrinkles, ensuring comfort in any season. With a quarter-zip design, polo collar, long sleeves, and ribbed cuffs, it blends classic style with modern interest. Versatile and easy to match with slacks, shorts, jeans, or formal pants, it’s perfect for casual wear, work, and more. The pullover is easy to maintain with hand or machine washing.
Parfait … taille et tissu léger!!!
